title: Interactive marker does not move while scaling an object

content.raw: While using the translation/rotation mode, the interactive marker moves following the operation that the user is doing. For example, if I'm rotating the model, the interactive marker also rotates. However, when we are in scale mode, the interactive marker does not change while I'm scaling the object pulling from one of the axes. I would expect the same behavior as with the other two modes.
